channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Clashes, Standoffs in South China Sea as Global Powers Vie for Influence
item.description: China is increasingly coming head to head with the Philippines and its allies in the South China Sea. It comes as Manila seeks to assert authority in the face of aggressive behavio

item.title: Analysis: How Taiwan Deals With 'Enormous' Amounts of E-Waste
item.description: As a major tech hub, Taiwan's electronic manufacturing produces a lot of e-waste. We speak to Armin Ibitz, associate professor at the Wen Zao Ursuline University, on what can be do

item.title: Beijing Reopens Tourism to Taiwan’s Outlying Matsu Islands
item.description: The Chinese government has announced that tour groups from Fujian province can visit Taiwan’s outlying Matsu Islands. The head of Taiwan’s Mainland Affairs Council, Chiu Tai-san, s

item.title: Taipei High-School Band To Perform at Presidential Inauguration
item.description: Taipei's Jian Guo High School marching band is finalizing their first ever performance for the inauguration of the incoming president, Lai Ching-te, on May 20.
